Summary: A dark clowd in the sea in the night emitting pillar shaped lighnings in the water for 2 hours without a sound.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Balchik
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working on reception in a hotel that night when I saw a dark clowd in the night, deep in the sea. The clowd emited lightnings at one spot every 12-11 sec. without moving or making a sound, the object stood there for around 2 hours than dissapered. Other people also saw it but didn`t payed too much attension.
